item.title: SetupJenkinsCI
item.description: AIM Jenkins + Packer.io + GitLab + Gogs, for automatically building the virtual machine images. Jenkins Installation/Configuration TBD GitLab Refers to: https://github.com/sameersbn/docker-gitlab Image Preparation Using docker for installing gitlab. First pull the docker image back via: $ docker pull sameersbn/gitlab:8.9.6 Also pull back the postgres and redis images, for we will link to these container’s services: $ docker pull sameersbn/postgresql:9.4-22 $ docker pull sameersbn/redis:latest Run GitLab Create the data directory for holding the data:
